<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Welcome to My Website</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="assets/css/style.css"> <!-- Link to your CSS file -->
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif; /* Default font */
            margin: 0;
            padding: 20px;
            background-color: #f8f9fa; /* Light background color */
        }
        h1 {
            color: #343a40; /* Darker color for headers */
        }
        img {
            float: left; /* Align image to the left */
            margin-right: 15px; /* Space between image and text */
            width: 185px; /* Width of the image */
        }
        p {
            line-height: 1.6; /* Line height for better readability */
        }
        .container {
            max-width: 800px; /* Max width for content */
            margin: auto; /* Center the content */
            background: white; /* White background for the content area */
            padding: 20px; /* Padding inside the content area */
            border-radius: 5px; /* Rounded corners */
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); /* Subtle shadow */
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="container">
        <h1>Welcome to My Website</h1>
        <h2>Bio</h2>
        <img src="images/indiv_pic_oscar.jpg" alt="Lana Hashem">
        <p>My name is Lana Hashem, and I am a recent bioengineering graduate currently completing an accelerated master's degree in data analytics engineering at George Mason University. I have experience in Python, R, SQL, and C programming languages.</p>
    </div>
</body>
</html>
